attributes.name: [Azure OpenAI] Quota Error Rates above threshold

esqlQuery.esql:
// The recommended threshold value for quota errors is > 0, and the alerting rule is grouped by Model Name. You can adjust the threshold value by modifying the quota_error count in the WHERE clause. 
 FROM logs-azure_openai.logs-default
| STATS quota_error = COUNT(http.response.status_code == 429) by azure.dimensions.model_deployment_name
| WHERE quota_error > 0
